item.title: Sunken Pavement, 10th April
item.description:
Sunken pavement outside number 13 St Peters Square leading from lampost to road. Sunken block paving and tarmac.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, St Peter's Square, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Pot hole is on left hand side of road just before previously reported pot hole near junction of Robert’s Road., 10th April
item.description:
Pot hole is on left hand side of road driving in direction toward Desert Orchid Road and is on the opposite side of road just before pot hole previously reported near Robert’s Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Noverton Lane, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bed of seat is detached from frame, 10th April
item.description:
The seat is rotten and the horizontal slatted seat is no longer safely supported. This could cause injury if it collapses which I believe is very likely. I reported this to the receptionist in the Cheltenham Council Building last week but nothing has been done…..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32-48, Promenade, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extremely raised pavement, 10th April
item.description:
Area around tree stump has been paved leading to a very large mound in the middle of the pavement, causing a big obstruction to people with mobility issues and a general hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Tewkesbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Seriously degraded road surface, damaging vehicles, 10th April
item.description:
Between Noverton Lane and Three Sisters Lane, Roberts Road's surface is seriously degraded. I am aware of two vehicles (including my own) where tyre pressure sensors have broken due to this surface. Requires re-surfacing urgently please. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Roberts Road, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
